text: Nina Companeez (born 26 August 1937 - 9 April 2015) was a French screenwriter and film director. She was known for her movies The Horseman on the Roof, Adorable menteuse, and The Diary of an Innocent Boy. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2015 deaths Category:French movie directors Category:French screenwriters Category:Writers from Boulogne- Billancourt
title: Nina Companeez
